title: 服务端崩溃，出现多个WARN,怎么办.
author: PureBossML
txt_content:
[qq]1499926735[/qq]<<<<这是我QQ

07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDeleg ... on.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.<init>(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN java.net.UnknownHostException: api.curseforge.com
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN If you have not recently modified your configuration and this is the first time you are seeing this message, the site may be experiencing temporary downtime.
07.04 11:08:58 [Server] WARN The updater could not contact dev.bukkit.org for updating.


求解答！！<<刮开。。。

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content:
这是正常的，这个报错意为无法连接到dev.bukkit.org，就是连接超时的意思，可以忽略，没有影响
若你不想看到这些警告信息，请关闭插件检查更新的功能
服务器能够正常启动吗？如果不能看一下内存是否直接溢出了！

replies.author: PureBossML
replies.txt_content:
hcrgm1 发表于 2015-4-7 11:16
这是正常的，这个报错意为无法连接到dev.bukkit.org，就是连接超时的意思，可以忽略，没有影响
若你不想看 ...
